p: HCV is an RNA virus that affects >180 million individuals worldwide. In the USA, antibodies to HCV are present in approximately 0.2 % of children ages 6–12 and 0.4 % of those ages 12–19. Overall, approximately 28,000 new HCV infections occur in the USA each year, although the specific incidence in children is unknown [ 124]. Chronic HCV infection is estimated to affect 0.1–2 % of children in the USA.
